document.full_text: nigeria's two main opposition parties have failed to reach an eleventh-hour alliance to unseat president goodluck jonathan, leaving them divided ahead of elections in three days time.
document.title: nigeria opposition fails to strike election pact
lines_and_colors: nigeria's two main opposition parties have failed to reach an eleventh-hour alliance to unseat president goodluck jonathan, leaving them divided ahead of elections in three days time.
